thread.section_title: LymphedemaProducts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LymphedemaProducts.com | lymphedemaproducts.com
thread.title: MTB

author: MTB
title: MTB
text: I found true what my recommending person said about this company was true. They assisted me in how to do my initial order and my product arrived quickly. Although after 10 minutes of wear I knew I preferred a different style. I called and received explicit instructions on how to return item and my new order was placed on the spot with a promise of credit to my card once returned item inspected. My new item arrived within 3 days. wearing them and very satisfied.
